data.comment: The first-half is now underway.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 2, Free kick Valencia.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Marc Bartra is booked for the away team.
In the minute 3, Throw-in for Betis in the half of Valencia.
Throw-in high up the field for Betis in Valencia.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Betis throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 5, Betis push forward at Mestalla and Nabil Fekir gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Valencia defence.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In the minute 8, Betis's Cristian Tello gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Valencia are too eager and fall into an offside trap.
In the minute 10, Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Valencia's Daniel Wass is on target but unsuccessful.
In the minute 12, Betis are in shooting range from this free kick.
Goncalo Guedes (Valencia) gets a yellow card.
Betis to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
In the minute 13, Valencia have a goal kick.
Can Betis get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Valencia's half?
Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Betis.
In the minute 15, Can Betis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis just outside Valencia's area.
Nabil Fekir for Betis gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 16, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Throw-in for Betis in their own half.
Sergio Canales scores to make it 0-1 at Mestalla.
In the minute 19, Great play from Joaquin to set up the goal.
Valencia are whistled for offside.
Betis will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Valencia.
In the minute 22, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Betis push upfield and Antonio Sanabria gets his head to the ball. The attempt is cleared by an alert Valencia defence.
Throw-in for Betis close to the penalty box.
In the minute 24, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Throw-in Betis.
In the minute 25, Ball safe as Valencia is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Valencia throw-in in Betis's half.
In the minute 28, Goal kick for Betis at Mestalla.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 29, Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
It's getting dangerous! Free kick for Betis close to the penalty box.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
In the minute 32, Corner awarded to Betis.
Ball goes out of play for a Valencia goal kick.
Valencia are caught offside.
In the minute 34, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Betis a goal kick.
Throw-in for Valencia at Mestalla.
Valencia to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
In the minute 37, Valencia have a goal kick.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Betis have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In the minute 39, Betis drives forward and Nabil Fekir gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
Free kick for Valencia in their own half.
In Valencia a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 41, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
In Valencia Valencia drive forward through Maxi Gomez. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Throw-in for Valencia at Mestalla.
In the minute 42, Throw-in for Valencia in the half of Betis.
Valencia have a dangerous throw-in.
Betis awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 43, Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
In the minute 45, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez blows to end the first-half.
At Mestalla, Hugo Guillamon has been yellow-carded for the home team.
The second-half is underway at Mestalla.
Throw-in Betis.
In the minute 46, It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 50, Valencia have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a throw-in for Valencia, close to Betis's area.
Free kick for Valencia in the half of Betis.
In the minute 51, Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
Betis's Nabil Fekir gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Valencia defender.
Corner awarded to Betis.
In the minute 52, Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
Free kick for Betis in their own half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia.
Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
In the minute 54, Sergio Canales (Betis) has received a yellow card from Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Betis are pushing forward but Nabil Fekir's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 55, It's a goal kick for the home team in Valencia.
Javi Gracia is making the team's second substitution at Mestalla with Kang In Lee replacing Jason.
Alex Blanco is replacing Goncalo Guedes for the home team.
In the minute 57, Betis needs to be cautious. Valencia have an attacking throw-in.
Valencia advance rapidly upfield but Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez blows for offside.
Can Betis capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
In the minute 61, Nabil Fekir for Betis drives towards goal at Mestalla. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Betis attack but Sergio Canales's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 62, Goal kick for Valencia at Mestalla.
Valencia drive forward at breakneck speed but are pulled up for offside.
Alex Moreno gets his shot on target but fails to score for Betis.
In the minute 63, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Valencia awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Betis at Mestalla.
In the minute 64, Sergio Canales of Betis smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Valencia in their own half.
Betis have a goal kick.
In the minute 67, Valencia to take a throw-in in Betis territory.
Valencia's Daniel Wass misses with an attempt on goal.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Betis a goal kick.
In the minute 68, Can Betis capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Valencia's half?
Betis have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
Throw-in for Betis close to the penalty box.
In the minute 71, Guido Rodriguez (Betis) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Corner awarded to Betis.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a Betis throw-in in Valencia's half.
In the minute 73, Ball safe as Betis is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Valencia have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal! Cristian Tello extends Betis's lead to 0-2.
In the minute 74, Joaquin with an assist there.
Valencia have been awarded a corner by Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez.
In Valencia, Daniel Wass of Valencia is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
In the minute 78, Throw-in for Valencia in their own half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Manuel Pellegrini (Betis) is making a first substitution, with William Carvalho replacing Joaquin.
In the minute 81, Valencia make their third substitution with Manu Vallejo replacing Kevin Gameiro.
The home team have replaced Geoffrey Kondogbia with Carlos Soler. This is the fourth substitution made today by Javi Gracia.
Valencia have a goal kick.
In the minute 82, Can Valencia get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Betis's half?
Corner awarded to Valencia.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 84, Throw-in for Betis in the half of Valencia.
Betis to take a throw-in in Valencia territory.
Borja Iglesias is on a sub for Antonio Sanabria for Betis.
In the minute 87, Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez awards Valencia a goal kick.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a free kick to Betis in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Valencia.
In the minute 89, Throw-in Valencia.
Betis awarded a free kick in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Betis goal kick.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Guillermo Cuadra Fernandez signals a throw-in for Betis, close to Valencia's area.
Valencia awarded a throw-in in their own half.
The whistle has gone to end the second half. The match finishes 0-2.
Andres Guardado is replacing Nabil Fekir for Betis at Mestalla.
Manuel Pellegrini is making the team's fourth substitution at Mestalla with Juanmi replacing Cristian Tello.
